text: (anal) evarukku kalvi nanam alikkappattirukankinrato avarkal, niccayamaka i(v vetamana)tu um'mutaiya iraivanitamiruntulla unmai enru arintu atan mitu iman kolvatarkakavum (avvaru ceytan, atan payanaka) avarkalutaiya irutayankal avan mun murrilum valippattup panikinrana melum; titanaka allah iman kontavarkalai nerana valiyil celuttupavanaka irukkinran
